page.title: 19MR.BROOKS' FARM AT RATBY.
page.content: An interview with Mr.Brooks,who farms at Old Hayes Farm,near Ratby. {How much land do you farm? On this farm I've got about 150 acres. {How many animals have you got? 110 Beef Cattle,1 Bull,21 Cows,500 sheep and lots of chickens.Some of the cattle are sent abroad to places like Iraq,India and Holland. {What are some of the problems of {keeping sheep? At lambing time some of the ewes die and others can't give enough milk. Wherever possible we try to get another ewe to take them on or they have to be fed from a bucket with teats. {Do you grow any crops?} I grow barley for animal feed and wheat which will be sent to the mill to be made into flour for bread.
